description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a user's profile screen, including UI components such as avatar, options list, and sign-in button.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the user's profile screen with account options and sign-in button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the profile screen UI.

classes.name: _Tile
classes.description: A private stateless widget representing an individual option tile in the profile menu.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget representing the list tile with icon, title, and tap callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for ProfileScreen and _Tile widgets.
